name: The Legend of Heavenly Mist [Demo]
description:
This is an impulsive  project  I got an idea of that fit perfectly  for Valentine  VN Jam, so I just have to make it. Since I started the project  on 13 Feb that is already halfway though the Jam, I couldn't make it in time and had to make a super early  demo to submit  to the Jam.

This is going to be a very short game. I had finished  most of the art assets for this game, some not included  in this demo because full script is not finalized. Full game should  be expected to be up in 1 or 2 weeks.

Known issues:

- Grammar error - the dev writes the script  when half asleep and have no time to proofread.

- No sound

- Very basic coding  and transitions 

Team:

- Sprites, CG, BG arts, script and coding by Saitoki 

- UI created by the fabulous Foleso
